unit_id=#unit_id# pos_id=#pos_id# upload_time=#upload_time# remark=#remark#
create_time=#create_time# create_user_id=#create_user_id# if_flag=#if_flag#
where monitor_log_id = #monitor_log_id#;
insert into t_monitor_log( monitor_log_id ,unit_id ,pos_id ,upload_time ,remark ,create_time ,create_user_id ,if_flag ,customer_id ) select a.* From ( select #monitor_log_id# monitor_log_id ,#unit_id# unit_id ,#pos_id# pos_id ,#upload_time# upload_time ,#remark# remark
,#create_time# create_time ,#create_user_id# create_user_id
,#if_flag# if_flag ,#customer_id# customer_id ) a left join t_monitor_log b on(a.monitor_log_id = b.monitor_log_id) where b.monitor_log_id is null ;
